overview: From the lens of a curious documentary filmmaker, the film takes you on a fascinating journey about exploring more than 200 types of fungi found in the dense forest of Gujarat. The film showcases the dietary, medicinal, livelihood and socio-economic aspects of fungi. Along with showing the different species of mushrooms, the film also shows the stages of how a fungi grows and how it is used at various levels.
title: Mushroom: The Magical Fungi
